mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT p.prdt_id, p.prdt_nm, p.prdt_prc, p.sale_st, p.reg_dt, p.mod_dt, p.s_cat_id, p.l_cat_id, pi.prdt_img AS prdt_Img FROM product p INNER JOIN product_img pi ON p.prdt_id = pi.prdt_id AND pi.is_main = 'Y' ORDER BY p.prdt_id desc ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 4

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT p.prdt_id, p.prdt_nm, p.prdt_prc, p.sale_st, p.reg_dt, p.mod_dt, p.s_cat_id, p.l_cat_id, pi.prdt_img AS prdt_Img FROM product p INNER JOIN product_img pi ON p.prdt_id = pi.prdt_id AND pi.is_main = 'Y' ORDER BY p.mod_dt asc ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 4

SELECT r.RE_NO, img.prdt_img, p.prdt_id, p.prdt_nm, r.CONTENTS, r.CREAT_DT, r.POINT, r.ME_ID, r.ORDT_ID FROM review r JOIN product p ON r.prdt_id = p.prdt_id JOIN product_img img ON p.prdt_id = img.prdt_id WHERE img.is_main = 'Y' AND p.prdt_id = #{prdtId} ORDER BY r.RE_NO DESC

SELECT p.prdt_id, p.prdt_nm, p.prdt_prc, p.sale_st, p.reg_dt, p.mod_dt, p.s_cat_id, p.l_cat_id, pi.prdt_img AS prdt_Img FROM product p INNER JOIN product_img pi ON p.prdt_id = pi.prdt_id AND pi.is_main = 'Y'
p.prdt_nm LIKE '%' || #{prdtNm} || '%'
AND (p.sale_st = 'ST3' OR p.sale_st = 'ST2')
ORDER BY p.prdt_id
SELECT s_cat_id, l_cat_id, s_cat_nm, s_cat_st FROM ( SELECT s_cat_id, l_cat_id, s_cat_nm, s_cat_st FROM product_s_cat ORDER BY s_cat_id )

SELECT P.prdt_id, P.prdt_nm, P.prdt_prc, P.sale_st, P.reg_dt, P.mod_dt, P.prdt_desct, pi.prdt_img, (select prdt_Id FROM interest_product WHERE me_id=#{meId} AND prdt_id=P.prdt_id) interestY, pi.is_main
FROM PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_IMG PI ON P.PRDT_ID = PI.PRDT_ID WHERE P.PRDT_ID = #{prdtId} AND pi.is_main = 'Y'
SELECT opt_id, prdt_id, opt_nm FROM product_option WHERE prdt_id = #{prdtId} ORDER BY opt_id
SELECT opt_deta_id, opt_deta_nm, add_prc, opt_id FROM product_option_detail WHERE opt_id IN (SELECT opt_id FROM product_option WHERE prdt_id = #{prdtId}) ORDER BY opt_deta_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "INTEREST_PRODUCT"( prdt_id, me_id, int_in_dt ) VALUES( #{prdtId}, #{meId}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT prdt_id, prdt_nm, prdt_desct, prdt_prc, reg_dt, mod_dt FROM product WHERE prdt_nm LIKE '%' || #{prdtNm} || '%' ORDER BY prdt_id
